short_title: Help Encourage a Lifetime of Public Service Act
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text:
Help Encourage a Lifetime of Public Service Act

This bill makes first responders and certain farmers or ranchers eligible for the Public Service Loan Forgiveness Program and eliminates interest on federal student loans of certain borrowers employed in the public service sector.
